title: OXA Schema
description: JSON Schema for OXA document types

Block.title: Block
Block.description: Union of all block content types.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: A document with metadata, title, and block content.

type.description: The type discriminator for Document nodes.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node.

classes.description: A list of class names for styling or semantics.

data.description: Arbitrary key-value data attached to the node.

title.description: The document title as inline content.

children.description: The block content of the document.

Heading.title: Heading
Heading.description: A heading with a level and inline content.

type.description: The type discriminator for Heading nodes.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node.

classes.description: A list of class names for styling or semantics.

data.description: Arbitrary key-value data attached to the node.

children.description: The inline content of the heading.

Inline.title: Inline
Inline.description: Union of all inline content types.

type.description: The type discriminator for Paragraph nodes.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node.

classes.description: A list of class names for styling or semantics.

data.description: Arbitrary key-value data attached to the node.

children.description: The inline content of the paragraph.

type.description: The type discriminator for Strong nodes.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node.

classes.description: A list of class names for styling or semantics.

data.description: Arbitrary key-value data attached to the node.

Text.title: Text
Text.description: A text node containing a string value.

type.description: The type discriminator for Text nodes.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node.

classes.description: A list of class names for styling or semantics.

data.description: Arbitrary key-value data attached to the node.
